original_text: Abner also went himself to speak to the men of Benjamin's tribe. After that, he went to Hebron. He went to tell David what all Israel's people had agreed to do. All the people of Benjamin's tribe had also agreed the same thing.
korean_text: 아브넬이 또 베냐민 사람의 귀에 말하고 아브넬이 이스라엘과 베냐민의 온 집이 선하게 여기는 모든 것을 다윗의 귀에 말하려고 헤브론으로 가니라

sentences.original_text: to speak to the men of Benjamin's tribe
After that, he went to Hebron
what all Israel's people had agreed to do
All the people of Benjamin's tribe
had also agreed the same thing
